text.paragraph: I am a professional project management leader with 20 years of experience in the Financial Services Industry and 10 years of progressive experience leading teams and delivering high priority projects integral to organizational success.

I enjoy developing high performance teams through mentoring, knowledge sharing and standardizing processes to create a unified approach to both project and change management.  I leverage technology to refine processes to improve efficiencies, accessibility to project information and transparency.

I am known for my ability to bridge the communication gap and translate information between business and IT to foster an environment of mutual understanding and respect when working towards common goals. I enjoy collaborating with project sponsors to highlight the benefits of initiatives and improve project governance with set expectations and standards.  I am a servant leader who focuses on team development and well-being and I am always willing to jump in and get my hands dirty to support team success.
